website_summaries.verdict: Whether you are new to gel manicures or just want to get all of the items you need with one purchase, this well-stocked kit will likely impress you.
pros: Complete kit includes an LED lamp, base and top coats, polish, remover, and more
Items can be used with other gel polishes by the brand to create professional gel manicures
A good value considering all that is included
cons: Rarely kits arrived with damaged products or an LED lamp that didn't work properly
The company's claim of 21-day wear is questionable

customer_reviews.title: Not quite big enough
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt let me put all four fingers in, and I have child sized hands. But otherwise, it's really nice
customer_reviews.author: Louisiana resident

customer_reviews.title: Wrong polish color
customer_reviews.text: The picture of the product I ordered showed a bottle of red polish. Mine came with a bottle of light pink polish. I don’t wear light pink and each bottle is $12. I would never have purchased if I knew it wasn’t coming with the red polish. Contemplating returning. Haven’t used the kit yet but I know someone who has the same kit and it works for her.
customer_reviews.author: B. K. Brosi

customer_reviews.title: Lazy packaging ruined products
customer_reviews.text: Top coat unscrewed in shipping and spilled over everything ruining the UV light. Even if the UV light wasn’t ruined I now don’t have a top coat, so I can’t do a gel manicure, rendering everything I ordered useless. OH and this item isn’t eligible for returns, convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing manicure option!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this Red Carpet Kit. For years I have paid fifty dollars a nail salon visit and this ended that. I'm saving about a hundred dollars a month for this tiny investment! Don't be daunted or scared at doing it alone, these instructions are really simple, clear and laid out so that you absolutely understand each step and what to do. Grab some polishes to go along with this, because it does come with one color it's so easy you'll definitely wan a few! I was really suprised that my manicure was lasting three weeks at a time with NO peeling or color issues. I absolutely love it and will continue to use it and save money!
customer_reviews.author: Feistybelle

customer_reviews.title: Money Saver
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I have used at home gel manicure kits before and they never worked right. They would chip or peel easily. This one is awesome!! I have never had much luck doing my own nails at home, but this one has changed my life and saved me a ton of money by not having to go to the salon every two weeks. A freind referred me to this kit and I am really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: imar0ckstar

customer_reviews.title: Looove it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it, love it, love it, love it! Who knew doing your nails could be so fun, easy and affordable? I had my daughter and granddaughter come over so that I could do their nails as well. Wish I'd come across this product years ago and saved myself a significant amount of money! It's great, my nails look fabulous and I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Decent starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great kit! I got this one in addition to another and although this one is great, it is missing a few things that would help with removal of the polish so you can do your nails again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great price! (at the time)
customer_reviews.text: Got it for $40. I was thrilled as I'm not exactly rich but really wanted this. Works just like it should. Comes with a bottle of removed (100% acetone nail polish removed), a bottle of "purify" (isopropyl alcohol - just use some rubbing alcohol when it runs out), a bright red gel polish, a gel base coat, a gel top coat, some cuticle oil, a little prep bottle, and of course the UV light. Reallllly bright, I usually try to use sun block on my hands and throw a little washcloth over it as it's curing so that I'm not blinded by the bright light.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Karbet

customer_reviews.title: love my new nails!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is just what you need to do gel nails at home. I am not good at doing my nails but I followed the instructions and they came out perfect! I am going to save so much money! I do wish the light fit all 5 fingers but I can live with it. I am one of those people who read review after review before I buy and I can tell you this is the best one to get if you are just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: tucker207

customer_reviews.title: Great product for do-it-yourself gel manicures
customer_reviews.text: This kit is easy to use, although the process of doing your own gel manicure is a bit tedious and time consuming. (Leave an hour to do it. It's a good activity to do in front of the tv.) The end result is great though, and this has paid for itself when I think about how much I would've spent by now on professional manicures. If applied correctly (the key is to apply very sparingly!), it lasts for around 2 weeks and looks exactly like a professional manicure. It takes some time and patience to do, so don't order this if you aren't blessed with time or patience for this kind of thing.
customer_reviews.author: MargaretP

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for my teenaged daughter
customer_reviews.text: This kit works great, is easy to use, and the result is more than adequate. In fact, my daughter does her own nails and gets a better result than she sometimes has in the past at the salon. This kit has been used heavily for nearly a year now and the light still works great. I've had to replace supplies but are all available either locally or on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Peels easily
customer_reviews.text: It peels off easity I had this product previoult,the picture waa different and i didn't know it was the same. Spent alot of money and it cant be returned
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a 3 star since it was cheap--not bad for the price. The polish doesn't seem to last as long as when I get my nails professionally done. I had high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Salon quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this nail product. It was easy to use and my nails look like I just left the salon.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Yohe

customer_reviews.title: A great starter pack
customer_reviews.text: Might be a little pricey but it was worth it for me! A great starter pack, especially for someone like me who is just learning. Very easy to use and works great! My polish actually lasts longer than when I get gel at the salon (:
customer_reviews.author: rachael

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I bought this kit
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this kit! It saves time and money from going to the nail salon!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived one day later from the estimated arrival day but in good condition. The product is easy to use and lasting! It has been 3 and a 1/2 week since I used it and my nails are as good as the day I just finished. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lady

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Pro 45 Starter Kit---you won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: LOVED THIS! Follow the instructions carefully if you want the true salon look. I got so many compliments on my nails (that I did myself). They lasted a full 3 weeks. I was so impressed I bought 2 other shades made by Red Carpet. Alas, I also was seduced into buying a "gel" brand at Walgreen's (buy one, get one free). The results were NOT as stellar as Red Carpet's polish. [BTW, Walgreen's offers a money-back guarantee if you use a cosmetic product and then don't like it, but I had misplaced the receipts. I will not be using any product other than Red Carpet polish in the future.]
customer_reviews.author: B. G. Morris

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great deal for a good product. great instructions included. very easy to follow instructions and use. I definitely got the right one and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SRQ girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! Lasts on my nails easily for 14+ days, and half the time I take it off because I get sick of the color and it's grown out. Never chips. My patients at work constantly comment how nice my nails look, and can't believe I do it myself. Would highly recommend! Many friends have now gotten addicted to doing their nails because of me :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good kit
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with this product. Follow all directions as listed in the instruction booklet and your manicure will come out looking professional. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dalba Castrillon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit early April and never got a chance to use it. The first week of May I attempted to do my nails and two of the three bulbs would not come on in the led light. The seller could/would not offer a refund or exchange due to the time limit. The product is defective and I'm stuck with this junk. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie portwood

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this manicure kit I always have a problem with ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this manicure kit I always have a problem with my nailpolish chipping after a day but this gel polish lasts for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Lissa2054

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I can't vouch for how long it lasts (I just tried it today) but it looks amazing! Better than any manicure I've paid for. Easy, though slightly time consuming. Just gorgeous color.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my sister
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister and she loves it! She has used it once so far and said it did a great job of drying the shellac polish! I may have to get one of these for myself now!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE LOVING IT LOOKS LIKE IF THEY WOULD HAVE GONE TO THE SALON
customer_reviews.text: FIRST TIME TOOK ME 10 MIN TO DO MY DAUGHTERS PEDIS AND 10 MORE FOR THE MANIS. THEY ARE LOVING IT LOOKS LIKE IF THEY WOULD HAVE GONE TO THE SALON. MAKES MOMMY AND DAUGHTERS TIME EVEN MORE FUN WITHOUT THE WAIT OF 30 MIN FOR THE POLISH TO DRY... LOVE IT!!! ITS NOT ROCKET SCIENCE ITS VERY SIMPLE AND EASY. MOST DEF ONE OF THE BEST INVESTMENTS I HAVE MADE.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA

customer_reviews.title: color not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Nail polish that comes with the package is totally different than the one listed on the product. Nail polish quality is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Easy instructions, easy to use. Beautiful nails! I bought kits for my daughters when they left for school. A real money saver!
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my red carpet nail polish! My right hand polish has only been lasting about 10 days and the left hand a lot longer since I don't use it as my main hand. 10 days is awesome though compared to other polish so I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Eric R Prock

customer_reviews.title: The one included chips a lot more easily than gel should
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, but buy separate polishes. The one included chips a lot more easily than gel should. Also they are very small sized.
customer_reviews.author: Roro eli

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I did my first gel manicure last night. I love the set and the LED dryer is the perfect size for my hands. The instructions were easy to follow and my nails look great. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: manatorn

customer_reviews.title: I like my manicure!
customer_reviews.text: The kit does its work, very comfortable, looks great! Just need some more practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little gel kit for 1st time users. I highly recommend purchasing this kit before spending a lot of money on any of the more expensive ones. The light works great and isn't cheaply made or flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Ali530

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Very clean and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very clean and easy to use... Haven't removed it yet so that may be the test so far after 5 days of wear it still looks salon new!
customer_reviews.author: Riverflats

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely one of the better vendors. A+ shopping experience; top quality product; super fast service. I would recommend them without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! I'm so happy I purchased it. After reading tons of reviews I had no idea what I was getting into, but now that I got it home and tried it for myself I have to admit this little kit really rocks. It was my first time trying to do LED nails myself and they came out perfect. I would suggest watching a few tutorials before you receive the kit so you are ready for the process when it does arrive. I am a happy customer, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sirena Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Cannot your gel because the light is not strong enough ...
customer_reviews.text: Cannot your gel because the light is not strong enough nail polishes are really weak and the whole kit is not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Maggz

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend this
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this LED lamp at all. Too small and obviously because it's small, I don't think it did a good job on drying.
customer_reviews.author: Laur S

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: One word...AMAZING!! Follow the directions and you'll have beautiful nails that last 2+ weeks!
customer_reviews.author: R M R

customer_reviews.title: Yes,yes and yes!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely excited about this product. So far everything is going great. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: I got for her birthday after she borrowed same unit from a friend and loved it. Her nails look great for weeks
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this thing! I got for her birthday after she borrowed same unit from a friend and loved it. Her nails look great for weeks.
customer_reviews.author: clause

customer_reviews.title: Best Kit Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This kit saves me soo much time and money! Soo easy for the at home manicure and inexperienced person. Seriously the best purchase I have made in a long time. It pays for itself over and over!
customer_reviews.author: jcm

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product! Everything came as stated in product review. Extremely satisfied with everything! Very easy to operate and long-lasting nail color!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend for her birthday. She initially wasn't very impressed due to the small size, and we contemplated returning it. However, after using it she fell in love! It's a winner! Her nails always look fabulous :)
customer_reviews.author: Beryl

customer_reviews.title: Great for first day
customer_reviews.text: Great for first day....but the gel peels off so easy. The light kinda feels like it burns your hands at first too.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: So far great product. May need to make sure you have ...
customer_reviews.text: First products received were damaged. Was able to get a replacement on the damaged products. So far great product. May need to make sure you have time dedicated so that you take your time to get the polishes on. In the picture thought I was receiving red nail polish but instead got a light pink. Either way worth the savings in the long run if you have patience to do it on your own.
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best thing, I have saved much since learning with this kit!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: girl friend love it
customer_reviews.text: my girlfriend loved the only thing is to watch out for the little bottles inside they may leak and damage the product other than that she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! I am a dentist so I spend all day washing my hands and putting them in gloves the nail polish last for at least two weeks with no chipping it's fabulous I would recommend it to everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alys

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I orderd this through Amazon.com because this product qualified for free super saver shipping. When I received the product there was a defect wtih the adapter cord - it would not fit into the LED lamp therefore making the kit unable to use. Aparently, b/c this item has hazardous materials, Amazon will not replace or refund me for it. (interesting as they were the ones to ship it out to me). Hoping I get better help from the manufacturer - still waiting to hear back from their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: KellyM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The real deal salon quality nails! this machine pays for itself
customer_reviews.author: nadia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic deal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but it does take me several hours (2) to do whole manicure. Paid for itself in 2 mani's. Lasts about 20 days.
customer_reviews.author: anita amoroso

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My nails chip every 2 days. Not much of a difference from my regular nail polish
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Calvillo

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: After a little practice, works awesome! Lasts about 2 weeks and saves going to the salon and spending $30 - $35 a trip!!!! Don't hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: J. Manwarren

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was given to my daughter as a gift and she absolutely loves it! She loves how long the polish lasts using this system.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it just 4 stars is because you can only fit your fingers in, you have to do your thumb seperately (I have fairly small hands).
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Wright

customer_reviews.title: Better than my manicurist!
customer_reviews.text: Used also with other gel polishes with great success! Easy to use. There's Nothing I do not like about it.
customer_reviews.author: Momofthreemiracles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I got a red polish that came with the kit. I would've preferred white...but honestly that's just me being picky...product works great for at home nail work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: light malfunction
customer_reviews.text: While setting this up I realized that the power cord does not fit into the light, its too big!! So I dug out a similar power cord that did fit into the light, unfortunately this also did not work. I think that the light was damaged in some way. You can't return this product due to hazardous materials, but thanks Amazon for giving me a refund on this item. I will try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: linzlee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Bought this for my wife and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Drew W

customer_reviews.title: Saves $$$
customer_reviews.text: It was quite easy to learn how to use this and the results are very professional looking! I do not think I will ever go back to regular polish. This looks better and lasts longer!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottles were open and empty. Also, the dc cord that came in the box is too small for the pin of the light... So it cannot connect to the power to turn on. I would recommend NOT purchasing this brand. Amazon did fully refund my money since it was sold through Amazon and thanks to Amazon for making it a easy return.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product I highly recommend it! Long lasting, easy to apply, and easy to remove! Works perfect for me and my sister!
customer_reviews.author: jackalack

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT ORDER !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this item and same as everyone else it had leaked inside the pacakge and was all over the light. It says I can return it but I am going to persue getting a refund this is ridiculous I paid a ton for this piece of s***!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Never go to the nail salon again!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The review from Ereader in Pleaston,CA is very accurate. Thin coats and covering the tips are the key. Altough my first attempt was pretty thick it still looked good and lasted over 2 weeks. Dark colors take 4 coats but look great.For your first time I recommend getting a light color, it's more forgiving. I also invested in a standing lighted magnifying glass. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: CAsoccermom

customer_reviews.title: Red Carpet Light
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit, used it about 10 times, and the LED light quit working. Not pleased with this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Lubinski

customer_reviews.title: Damaged unusable item
customer_reviews.text: This was just opened and was completely broken and dried polish all over the dryer. And not able to return because of the contents. Would like a replacement but guess just have to eat the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Toni I Hauch

customer_reviews.title: Not any better
customer_reviews.text: This product/system is not what I was expecting. It is no different than the ones you can get at Walmart. The nails last about 3 days and then peal off. It does not come with a stick or emery board.
customer_reviews.author: Hartland

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $75.00 ! Nails Are Ruined!
customer_reviews.text: This gel manicure kit destroyed my nails. They are thin as paper, cracking, peeling, and HURT! I tried to return this product but due to special shipping and handling requirements, it is not eligible for return. Waste of $75.00!
customer_reviews.author: mcmorseCODE.

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit gives you a great, un-chippable manicure. I was a little worried by the fact that sometimes my fingers burned when I put them under the uv light.
customer_reviews.author: Ktandler13

customer_reviews.title: It won't work
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to give a good rating for something that lasted 4 times. I used it 4 times and I loved it but now the light won't stay on so I can't get it to work. I would like my money back, at least the price to replace the machine itself. I am totally dissapointed with this product I would not even give it a star but I had to if I wanted to write something about it. I bought it as a gift for someone and I must say it was quite an embarrassing when she told me it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Belanger

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used this product twice and my nails were damaged from using this product. It's been a month since I used it and my nails are still trying to recover.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Day

customer_reviews.title: petite users only
customer_reviews.text: Decent product but I wouldn't recommend it for people with large hands. I would recommend it for feet
customer_reviews.author: Daddyssmile

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived promptly in a shrink wrapped box with a strong gel polish coming from the box. I opened the box - Prep polish bottle, Structure polish bottle and the Brilliance bottle was opened and completely empty. The gel/polish spilled all over the LED light structure. You can not returned this item. DO NOT BUY THIS FROM AMAZON. READ THE OTHER REVIEWS ABOUT DELIVERY OF DAMAGED GOODS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Butler

customer_reviews.title: Terrible service
customer_reviews.text: This item is a waste of money. It does not work well, does not dry, not worth a penny. And you cannot return it once you open it. Customer service was horrible. Did not respond to my emails. They know its an item you cannot return based on amazon policy as it is considered a beauty product so they just ignore you. Do not buy anything from this seller. They are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Pure trash!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality....over rated and over charged for something that its simply not word it!!!!!! the size of the lamp it's for kids size hands.....just a sorry produc!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshy

customer_reviews.title: All the basics included
customer_reviews.text: Good kit. Ran out of the remove bottle quickly, but just use bulk acetone now. I'm not a huge fan of the red carpet reddy color because it is not very opaque but the light works great and it has everything to need to get started.
customer_reviews.author: RTB

customer_reviews.title: The light works well and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have done two manicures using this kit and have had no problems at all. The light works well and is easy to use. The instructions that come with the kit made it very easy for me and came with everything I needed. The polish that comes with the kit is super. It's tough as nails and holds up to my bad habit of using my nails as "household tools" and my gardening obsession. Yes, the price is not what I would call "cheap" but you will recoup your investment in a very short while.
customer_reviews.author: jbee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This systems is very easy to use! I do think the bottles of product it comes with are a bit small for the price, but i'll be ordering more when I'm out. I also ordered additional colors from Gellen (also small bottles), but they work together flawlessly. If you're tired of spending money to get your nails done, this is a fabulous alternative.
customer_reviews.author: ItsMeKenne

customer_reviews.title: I have used it several times and now I have perfect nails in the comfort of my own home and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been spending a lot of money going to a salon and having gel nails done, so I bought this to be able to save! I have used it several times and now I have perfect nails in the comfort of my own home and this paid for itself in just a couple uses! It's really no more difficult than polishing your nails with regular polish. With using the led light to cure it between each step, once you're finished they are completely cured and ready to use! No nicks or smudges! It came with everything I needed.
customer_reviews.author: nanabon

customer_reviews.title: Why does anyone use regular polish?
customer_reviews.text: Put on the layers as THIN as possible! And make sure they cover each other evenly and that the light hits all parts of the nail. If you do these things you will have a salon quality manicure for a very small fraction of the price in about 30 minutes. Lasts about 10 days, more if your hands aren't in much water. Regular nail polish would last maybe 2 days for me so it was basically pointless. This is an amazing alternative that I cannot believe I did not try sooner. One caveat, it's hard to get off. Resist the urge to peel or end up with damaged nails.
customer_reviews.author: laurapin

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It's super easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It's super easy to follow. I got other colors and all the structure and base coats work well with them even though they aren't from the same brand. Only thing I would change are the in the instructions. It doesn't tell you to wipe the sticky after coat left over every time you cure the polish, in between each coat. That I recommend doing, it makes for a flawless finish, and keeps the coats not as thick on the nail. And they last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Stop going to a salon and do it yourself
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this! My manis last so long with this! The red polish that was included is stunning! The quality is amazing! I am so excited to do my nails every chance I can. I paid $35 for a manicure every time I went and that was before tipping! I saved so much money by buying this!! I love it more than I can say. It takes some time to do but so does painting with regular polish and it chips within days!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like salon quality gel nails
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like salon quality gel nails. Takes a bit of practice if you are new to painting your nails neatly, but it is a fun little ritual once you get the hang of it. I have used other brands of polish and it worked fine--I'd say that the lack of colors from Red Carpet is my only complaint. (Although there are a ton of colors, I'm just picky). Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (17) purchased this to save herself the money of going to a salon. She has been doing her own nails for a couple of months now and is happy with way it is working out. It obviously takes a bit of practice to do them herself but she is happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best kit. Follow the directions and you will have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best kit. Follow the directions and you will have professional looking nails without the expense of the salon. Use thin layers, do not overdo it. they last at least two weeks for me and even more, if I don't mind a little wear showing after that, but I usually change it after two weeks, so I am not bored with the same color. I find I can get my nails done in about 20 minutes now that I have practice.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie May

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE JUST STARTED DOING MY GEL MANICURES BUT I LOVE IT. THIS KIT COMES WITH EVERYTHING GREAT PRICE, AND IT ALLOWS FOR BEAUTIFUL NAILS! MY AUNT BOUGHT HER OWN GEL NAIL KIT AND SHE SAID MINE IS BETTER! SO I THINK I GOT A GREAT DEAL. I WOULD RECOMMEND TO OTHERS FOR SURE. I HAVE HAD MY MANICURE FOR ALMOST 2 WEEKS NOW AND IT STILL LOOKS GOOD! MAKE SURE YOU READ THE INSTRUCTIONS VERY CAREFULLY, THAT IS MY ONLY TIP.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Does not fully cure gel polish
customer_reviews.text: You would be better off saving up for a decent lamp and buying a set of gel polish base and top coats separately. Their claim that the lamp "Cures gel polish nails in 45 seconds flat" is incorrect. The lamp in this kit is strong enough to make the polish tacky, but not strong enough to fully dry it (at least not in 45 seconds or even in 2 minutes). This is one of those instances where it sounded too good to be true and definitely was.
customer_reviews.author: S. Noell

customer_reviews.title: I love this manicure kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this manicure kit. I've been using it for almost a year and I still haven't ran out of anything in the kit so it's a great deal too. This kit has saved me a fortune on getting my nails done.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Wilbanks

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about the at home gel manicure systems. I went with this one because it's a little less expensive then others and the polishes are also less expensive. Such a great buy. The polishes last a long time and look really great. I don't have any problems with bubbles and I'm not the best manicurist. This will definitely save me a ton of money over going to the nail salon.
customer_reviews.author: Kshan1119

customer_reviews.title: Ok as a starter kit but you're better off buying components seperate
customer_reviews.text: Ok as a starter kit but you're better off buying components seperate. The pre/post clean is just alcohol. The remover is acetone which you can buy a bigger bottle at a beauty store. This leaves the polishes (only red color in lit) and UV light. The polishes are in a very small bottle and the UV light is too small to fit your entire hand. So if you are looking for convenience and one stop starter this is a good kit. If you are looking for long term supplies get the components seperate.
customer_reviews.author: wonderpassion

customer_reviews.title: Product Perfect, Works Well :-)
customer_reviews.text: The product itself arrived quickly and easily. I saved money from buying it in store, which is always a plus. The manicure itself is great. I'm rough on my nails, but it lasted easily a week without chipping, two weeks with minor chips + beginning to outgrow. A note to users: you can easily patch a nail and it looks 80-100% like the original job, so touchup is easy! Just watch for getting it on your skin. You do want to take it off prior to putting it under the magical blue light. Definitely a good product.
customer_reviews.author: bookkloverr

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my mother for Christmas. She loves it! So easy for her to use. It takes the first time to learn how to apply not so heavy, and she has it mastered. She plans on trying lots of new colors. This is a must if you love having beautiful nails.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Get this!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit! I got this about 3 months ago, and I'm still using all the original products. They last a long time, and the red that comes with this is very pretty. This was a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kaity Pearce

customer_reviews.title: PEELED off nailpolish - DID NOT work at all.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Nail polish chipped all the time and I ended up throwing this away! it was useless!!!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The manicure kit allowed for a pretty manicure with a very smooth glossy finish. Very professional looking manicure at a nice price. I've already would have paid for 4 gel manicures by now without the kit. It's already paid for itself. A good buy!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: The polish does not stay on long. It will ...
customer_reviews.text: The polish does not stay on long. It will peel off. I've not had issues with other gel polishes, just these.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Easy Breezy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and quick too! I am a licensed professional and I rank this system with OPI and Creative Nail systems. If you can polish your nails you can use this system. Also the LED light is an improvement over UV lights and takes much less time to cure between applications.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Done with salon gel manicures!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this kit! No more salon gel manicures for me. The LED light is so safe, I feel good not exposing my hands to UV light. My favorite is the top coat! Makes your nails look smooth and shiny like they are right out of the salon!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Clapp

product_meta.title: Red Carpet Manicure Pro 45 LED Gel Nail Polish Kit Soak Off Starter Package
product_meta.description: The RCM gel polish pro kit contains everything you need for a professional salon gel manicure in the comfort of your home. Our RCM professional LED Light is especially designed to efficiently cure RCM Structure, LED gel polish and brilliance in seconds. The Red Carpet ready manicure will last weeks of long wear and shine.
feature_bullets: Red Carpet Manicure New and Improved Pro Gel Polish Kit
Requires Use of Red Carpet Manicure or Gelish LED Drying Curing Lamp
Lamp accessories and colors can be used with any Red Carpet Manicure or Gelish Product
Lasts up to 21 days with perfect shine
Uses patented technology for easy soak off

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
